Architect.quote: An architect doesn’t just build walls—they craft the future in lines and light.
requiredSkillsAndQualifications: Should be well qualified and well experienced
Should handle office as well as onsite work

Interior.quote: The best rooms have something to say about the people who live in them.
requiredSkillsAndQualifications: Should be well qualified and well experienced
Should handle office as well as onsite work
Should do commercial and residential planning according to vastu

Surveying.quote: Survey engineers don’t just measure land—they lay the foundation for everything that follows.
requiredSkillsAndQualifications: Should be well qualified and well experienced
Should operate D.G.P.S., total station, Auto level

Urban.quote: Great urban planning turns space into community, and concrete into culture.
requiredSkillsAndQualifications: Should be well qualified and well experienced
Can do Urban township planning with accurate JDA norms
Should have knowledge about latest JDA township policies
